name: Songstress's Charm
effects: Inflict Sleep and Silence (30%) on all enemies

desc_short: Chance of silencing and putting to sleep all enemies
一定機率對全體敵人施加沉默睡眠效果

desc_long: Adds a chance of silencing and putting all enemies to sleep.

Posibilidad de silenciar y dormir a todos los enemigos.
